Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Alkylating Agent/Antineoplastic Alkylating Agent/Mustard Agent/Mustard Prodrug
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An agent when activated is converted into an active mustard alkylating agent at the tumor site, causing DNA cross-linking. These compounds may be used in antibody-directed enzyme prodrug therapy (ADEPT).
